source_objects.title: Web Development
source_objects.description: The world of web development is as wide as the internet itself. Much of our social and vocational lives play out on the internet, which prompts new industries aimed at creating, managing, and debugging the websites and applications that we increasingly rely on.

items.title: The Web Developer Bootcamp 2021
items.headline: COMPLETELY REDONE - The only course you need to learn web development - HTML, CSS, JS, Node, and More!
objectives_summary: The ins and outs of HTML5, CSS3, and Modern JavaScript for 2021
Make REAL web applications using cutting-edge technologies
Create responsive, accessible, and beautiful layouts

items.title: The Complete 2021 Web Development Bootcamp
items.headline: Become a full-stack web developer with just one course. HTML, CSS, Javascript, Node, React, MongoDB and more!
objectives_summary: Be able to build ANY website you want.
Craft a portfolio of websites to apply for junior developer jobs.
Build fully-fledged websites and web apps for your startup or business.
